title: Unreal Tournament 1999 GOTY - HD TEXTURES INCLUDED
description:
This is a complete installation of Unreal Tournament 1999 GOTY (Game of the Year Edition) with ALL FOUR BONUS PACKS and HD TEXTURES included!

This torrent contains a single file, which is a self-extracting archive.  To install/play:

- Run UnrealTournament1999HD.exe
- Enter the PARENT folder you would like to install Unreal Tournament in, such as C:Games (the folder "UnrealTournament" will be created here)
- Run UnrealTournamentSystemUnrealTournament.exe (don't forget to create a desktop shortcut)
- Get fragged

If you enjoy the game, you can purchase it at http://www.gog.com/game/unreal_tournament_goty (no DRM!)

From the README.txt:

For the highest quality graphics, ensure the OpenGL renderer is selected in Video settings.
Visit the 1chan.us UT99 server by connecting to ut.1chan.us (Click Multiplayer > Open location)
Questions?  See the UT99 thread at http://1chan.us/35737
